Class SimulationScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • SimulationScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class SimulationScreen
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A class that displays the main JFrame of the simulation and the GUI elements associated with it.
    Author:
    Sally Hui, Jiayin Huang, Tony Cui
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SimulationScreen.CustomButton
      A class to create customized JButtons.
      private class  SimulationScreen.Help
      A class for the help panel that pops up whenever "0" is pressed.
      private class  SimulationScreen.Legacy
      A class for the Spacetime legacy stats panel that pops up whenever "5" is pressed.
      private class  SimulationScreen.Legend
      A class for the Spacetime panel that displays the legend, listing what each shape color represent.
      private class  SimulationScreen.MyDispatcher
      Dispatches key events which are received by the inputKey method.
      private class  SimulationScreen.Settings
      A class of the JScrollpane settings panel that pops up when "1" is pressed.
      private class  SimulationScreen.Stats
      A class of the statistics panel that pops up when 2 is pressed.
      private class  SimulationScreen.StatsPanelMouseListener
      A mouse listener that updates the stats panel whenever a new Entity selection is made.
      private class  SimulationScreen.Zoom
      A class of the zoom panel that pops up whenever "3" is pressed.
      private class  SimulationScreen.ZoomPanelMouseListener
      Mouse listener to update to zoom panel whenever the mouse is moved.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulationScreen

        public SimulationScreen(java.lang.String title,
                int width,
                int height,
                WorldGenerator wg)
        Creates a new SimulationScreen of the specified dimensions, using a newly generated Viewport.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the SimulationScreen JFrame
        width - the width in pixels of the SimulationScreen JFrame
        height - the height in pixels of the SimulationScreen JFrame

      • SimulationScreen

        public SimulationScreen(java.lang.String simulationName,
                java.lang.String title,
                int width,
                int height,
                Viewport port)
        Creates a new SimulationScreen of the specified dimensions, using a provided Viewport.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the SimulationScreen JFrame
        width - the width in pixels of the SimulationScreen JFrame
        height - the height in pixels of the SimulationScreen JFrame
        port - the viewport which will be displayed in the SimulationScreen

    • Method Detail

      • selectTool

        public void selectTool(int tool)
        Deals with what happens when the user turns on one of the tools (settings, statistics, or zoom).
        Parameters:
        tool - which tool was selected (1 - settings, 2 - statistics, 3 - zoom)

      • inputKey

        public void inputKey(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Listens to the keyboard to open and close tools
        Parameters:
        e - the key event fired

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • serialize

        public void serialize()
        Saves/serializes the Viewport object. Files created can be deserialized by the deserialize method in the MainMenu class.

      • setLookAndFeel

        public void setLookAndFeel(boolean isDefault)
        Either sets the LookAndFeel for the UIManager to the default, or to Nimbus. In the program, Nimbus is used for the menus, while the default is used for in-game.
        Parameters:
        isDefault - true will set LookAndFeel to default

      • setAdding

        public void setAdding(boolean mode)
        Sets adding mode in the Viewport.
        Parameters:
        mode - true means that clicking will add an Entity

      • setDeleting

        public void setDeleting(boolean mode)
        Sets deleting mode in the Viewport.
        Parameters:
        mode - true means that clicking will delete an Entity

      • setExploring

        public void setExploring(boolean mode)
        Sets navigation mode in the Viewport.
        Parameters:
        mode - true means clicking and dragging will move the Viewport around the Spacetime grid

      • setKidnapping

        public void setKidnapping(boolean mode)
        Toggles entity moving mode in the Viewport.
        Parameters:
        mode - true means clicking will either pick up an Entity or drop off an Entity

      • setSelecting

        public void setSelecting(boolean mode)
        Sets selection mode in the Viewport.
        Parameters:
        mode - true means clicking will either pick up an Entity or drop off an Entity

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer()
        Starts the timer if it is not already running.

      • stopTimer

        public void stopTimer()
        Stops the timer.

      • updateRepaint

        public void updateRepaint()
        Revalidates and repaints the simulation screen.
